quote: The older a wizard grows, the more silent he becomes, like a woody vine growing over time to choke a garden path, deep and full of moss and snakes, running everywhere, impenetrable.
quote_letters: THE OLDER A WIZARD GROWS THE MORE SILENT HE BECOMES LIKE A WOODY VINE GROWING OVER TIME TO CHOKE A GARDEN PATH DEEP AND FULL OF MOSS AND SNAKES RUNNING EVERYWHERE IMPENETRABLE
